ingredients: 1 cup milk, 1  ripe avocado, peeled and pitted, 1  banana, cut into chunks, 3 tablespoons honey
nutrition: Total Fat 12g 15%, Saturated Fat 3g 13%, Cholesterol 7mg 2%, Sodium 39mg 2%, Total Carbohydrate 36g 13%, Dietary Fiber 6g 20%, Total Sugars 26g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 10mg 52%, Calcium 106mg 8%, Iron 1mg 3%, Potassium 599mg 13%
